text:
On this day 78 years ago, U.S. & allied forces stormed the beaches of Normandy to fight against evil. We will never forget their brave sacrifice.

"The eyes of the world are upon you. The hopes and prayers of liberty-loving people everywhere march with you." – General Eisenhower https://t.co/BLDmm0ss9D

Nothing is more important than our children's safety which is why I partnered with @NassauCountyPD to offer a car seat safety check for LI parents. Thank you to the officers who volunteered their time, @MassapequaLib for hosting, & to all the parents that came out for this event. https://t.co/BI8pYbYelF

As Long Islanders continue to pay the price for Biden’s Energy Crisis, I recently traveled to Houston, TX to learn more about domestic oil and gas production and see firsthand the potential of America's energy sector. We can and must produce the energy we need here at home. https://t.co/5WoXYSJUQR
